snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has given his players permission to celebrate the festive season but cancelled his own Christmas party ahead of the trip to Swansea City in the Premier League on Dec. 26....

headline.main: West Ham Squad Can Celebrate Wins While Bilic Prepares
headline.print_headline: West Ham Squad Can Celebrate Wins While Bilic Prepares

lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has given his players permission to celebrate the festive season but cancelled his own Christmas party ahead of the trip to Swansea City in the Premier League on Dec. 26.

snippet: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne is targeting a return to full training by the end March after damaging his knee ligaments last month....

headline.main: Injured De Bruyne Eyes Return to Man City Training
headline.print_headline: Injured De Bruyne Eyes Return to Man City Training

lead_paragraph: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne is targeting a return to full training by the end March after damaging his knee ligaments last month.

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp will not be at his team's Premier League game against Sunderland at Anfield on Saturday after suffering suspected appendicitis, the club said....

headline.main: Liverpool's Klopp to Miss Sunderland Game Due to Illness
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Klopp to Miss Sunderland Game Due to Illness

lead_paragraph: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp will not be at his team's Premier League game against Sunderland at Anfield on Saturday after suffering suspected appendicitis, the club said.

snippet: Hull City, who will return to the Premier League next season, have confirmed that manager Steve Bruce has left the club....

snippet: Everton forward Yannick Bolasie will have surgery to repair knee ligament damage sustained in the 1-1 draw at home to Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: Everton Forward Bolasie to Have Knee Surgery
headline.print_headline: Everton Forward Bolasie to Have Knee Surgery

lead_paragraph: Everton forward Yannick Bolasie will have surgery to repair knee ligament damage sustained in the 1-1 draw at home to Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Olivier Giroud is hoping for a run of starts for Arsenal after the French striker scored the late winner in Monday's 1-0 win over West Bromwich Albion at the Emirates Stadium....

headline.main: Patient Giroud Hopes Goal Can Lead to First Team Return
headline.print_headline: Patient Giroud Hopes Goal Can Lead to First Team Return

lead_paragraph: Olivier Giroud is hoping for a run of starts for Arsenal after the French striker scored the late winner in Monday's 1-0 win over West Bromwich Albion at the Emirates Stadium.

snippet: Pep Guardiola expects Manchester City to be without Ilkay Guendogan for a "long time" after the German midfielder suffered a suspected knee ligament injury in Wednesday's 2-0 Premier League win over Watford....

headline.main: Guardiola Expects Lengthy Injury Layoff for Guendogan
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Expects Lengthy Injury Layoff for Guendogan

lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola expects Manchester City to be without Ilkay Guendogan for a "long time" after the German midfielder suffered a suspected knee ligament injury in Wednesday's 2-0 Premier League win over Watford.

snippet: Senegalese striker Oumar Niasse remains determined to make an impact at Everton, confident he can cope with the demands of the Premier League despite being frozen out by manager Ronald Koeman....

headline.print_headline: Discarded Niasse Keen to Make Toffees Move Stick

lead_paragraph: Senegalese striker Oumar Niasse remains determined to make an impact at Everton, confident he can cope with the demands of the Premier League despite being frozen out by manager Ronald Koeman.

snippet: Liverpool have agreed to sell Belgium striker Christian Benteke to Premier League rivals Crystal Palace, the BBC said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Liverpool Agree to Sell Benteke to Palace-BBC

snippet: United States goalkeeper Brad Guzan is staying in the Premier League after joining promoted Middlesbrough from relegated Aston Villa....

headline.main: US Goalkeeper Guzan Leaves Aston Villa for Middlesbrough
headline.print_headline: US Goalkeeper Guzan Leaves Aston Villa for Middlesbrough

lead_paragraph: United States goalkeeper Brad Guzan is staying in the Premier League after joining promoted Middlesbrough from relegated Aston Villa.
